item.title: Markdown使用方法
Ubuntu搭建blog的一些指令
item.description: 1.install git and hugo  sudo apt install git  sudo apt install hugo 2.git set user’s information  git config –global user.name “zoey686”  git confit –global user.email “邮箱”  git config –list // show user.name and user.email 2.create a site  mkdir gitFile //create a folder to store the site  hugo new site mybolg 3.mybolg generated folder  1.archetypes Header format  2.content blog’s artical file  3.data custom template  4.layoutsa Website template file  5.static store pictures and other resorces

item.title: About
item.description: This is some static page where you can write about yourself.
